description: This template deploys a new instance of Tableau Server on Azure along with all required infrastructure elements.  This template supports deployment on both Windows and Linux based machines.  Tableau is an industry-leading business intelligence platform.  Tableau Server allows users to discover and share data-driven insights throughout their organization in a secure, governable environment.  For more information please visit our webpage: 'https://www.tableau.com/.'
summary: This template deploys a new instance of Tableau Server on a single Azure compute node along with all required infrastructure elements.  This template supports deployment on both Windows and Linux based machines.
